mapper.select: select a.appointment_id,a.appointment_title,a.sponsor_id,u.full_name sponsor_name, a.sponsor_date,u.avatar,ak.key_word, af.follow_count from appointment a join user u on a.sponsor_id = u.user_id join (select appointment_id, group_concat(word) key_word from appointment_keyword group by appointment_id) ak on a.appointment_id = ak.appointment_id left join (select appointment_id, count(*) follow_count from appointment_follower where follower_type='follower' group by appointment_id) af on a.appointment_id = af.appointment_id where a.company_id = #{companyId} order by af.follow_count desc limit #{skip},#{take};

select a.appointment_id,a.appointment_title,a.sponsor_id,u.full_name sponsor_name, a.sponsor_date,u.avatar,ak.key_word, af.follow_count from appointment a join user u on a.sponsor_id = u.user_id join (select appointment_id, group_concat(word) key_word from appointment_keyword group by appointment_id) ak on a.appointment_id = ak.appointment_id left join (select appointment_id, count(*) follow_count from appointment_follower where follower_type='follower' group by appointment_id) af on a.appointment_id = af.appointment_id where a.appointment_id = #{appointmentId}

select ai.item_id,ai.content,ai.sponsor_id,u.full_name sponsor_name, ai.sponsor_date, case when af.follow_count is null then 0 else af.follow_count end follow_count, case when af1.is_follow > 0 then 1 else 0 end is_follow from appointment_item ai join user u on ai.sponsor_id = u.user_id left join (select item_id, count(*) follow_count from appointment_follower where follower_type='follower' group by item_id) af on ai.item_id = af.item_id left join (select item_id, count(*) is_follow from appointment_follower where follower_id = #{userId} and follower_type='follower' group by item_id) af1 on ai.item_id = af1.item_id where ai.appointment_id = #{appointmentId}

select af.appointment_id,af.follower_id,u.full_name followerName, u.avatar,af.follow_type from ( select appointment_id,follower_id,follower_type follow_type from appointment_follower where appointment_id = #{appointmnetId} and follower_type = 'appointment_sponsor' group by appointment_id,follower_id,follower_type union select appointment_id,follower_id,follower_type follow_type from appointment_follower where appointment_id = #{appointmnetId} and follower_type = 'item_sponsor' and follower_id not in (select follower_id from appointment_follower where appointment_id = #{appointmnetId} and follower_type = 'appointment_sponsor') group by appointment_id,follower_id,follower_type union select appointment_id,follower_id,follower_type follow_type from appointment_follower where appointment_id = #{appointmnetId} and follower_type = 'follower' and follower_id not in (select follower_id from appointment_follower where appointment_id = #{appointmnetId} and (follower_type = 'appointment_sponsor' or follower_type = 'item_sponsor')group by follower_id) group by appointment_id,follower_id,follower_type ) af join user u on af.follower_id = u.user_id

select a.appointment_id,a.appointment_title,a.sponsor_id,u.full_name sponsor_name, a.sponsor_date,u.avatar,ak.key_word, af.follow_count from (select * from appointment where appointment_id in(select DISTINCT appointment_id from appointment_follower where follower_id =#{userid}))a join user u on a.sponsor_id = u.user_id join (select appointment_id, group_concat(word) key_word from appointment_keyword group by appointment_id) ak on a.appointment_id = ak.appointment_id left join (select appointment_id, count(*) follow_count from appointment_follower group by appointment_id) af on a.appointment_id = af.appointment_id
order by af.follow_count desc limit #{skip},#{take};

select a.appointment_id,a.appointment_title,a.sponsor_date,u.avatar from appointment a join user u on a.sponsor_id = u.user_id where a.appointment_title like '%${keyword}%' and a.company_id=#{companyid} and a.indicator=1 limit #{skip} ,#{take}

SELECT a.appointment_id, a.appointment_title, u.full_name sponsor_name, a.sponsor_date FROM appointment a left JOIN user u on a.sponsor_id = u.user_id WHERE a.company_id = #{companyId} AND a.indicator = 1 AND a.appointment_title LIKE '%${title}%' AND a.sponsor_date >= #{startDate} AND a.sponsor_date <= #{endDate} LIMIT #{skip}, #{take}

select a.appointment_id,a.appointment_title,u.full_name sponsor_name, a.sponsor_date,ak.key_word,af.follower_count from appointment a join user u on a.sponsor_id = u.user_id join (select appointment_id, group_concat(word) key_word from appointment_keyword group by appointment_id) ak on a.appointment_id = ak.appointment_id join (select appointment_id, count(appointment_id) follower_count from appointment_follower group by appointment_id) af on a.appointment_id = af.appointment_id where a.appointment_id = #{appointmentId}
